                         throws Exception
        Instantiates a new datacenter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        characteristics - the res config
        schedulingInterval - the scheduling interval // * @param utilizationBound the utilization bound
        vmAllocationPolicy - the vm provisioner
        storageList - the storage list

        Exception - the exception

    • Method Detail

      • updateCloudletProcessing

        protected void updateCloudletProcessing()
        Updates processing of each cloudlet running in this PowerDatacenter. It is necessary because Hosts and VirtualMachines are simple objects, not entities. So, they don't receive events and updating cloudlets inside them must be called from the outside.
        Overrides:
        updateCloudletProcessing in class ContainerDatacenter
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

        protected void processVmMigrate(SimEvent ev,
                                boolean ack)
        Description copied from class: ContainerDatacenter
        Process the event for a User/Broker who wants to migrate a VM. This PowerDatacenter will then send the status back to the User/Broker.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        ev - a Sim_event object
